description:
This course is packed with great information for Kindle and Createspace publishers and indie authors. You will not only find out how to format your book perfectly for Kindle and Createspace using just 1 document that you can upload to both platforms, but you will find out how to use your table of contents to generate you more sales and much, much more.

You will learn how to:

  • Create A Template that Can be Used For Kindle and CreateSpace
  • Use Styles and Setting Up Custom Styles
  • Understand What Page Size to Use and Why it's so Important
  • Understand Proper Spacing, Page Breaks and Section Breaks
  • Create a Click able, Auto-Updating Table of Contents
  • Make Your Table of Contents Sell Your Book for You
  • Bulk Out Your Paperbacks to Generate More Sales
  • Understand Copyright and Disclaimer Information
  • Use Simple Tips and Tricks to Improve Your Introduction and Final Chapter
  • Use and Format Images Properly to Keep Kindle Delivery Costs Down
This course also contains the following resources:
  • A Free Download of the Template I Personally Use
  • Fiction Book Disclaimer Template
  • Factual/Informational Book Disclaimer Template
  • Medical Disclaimer Book Template
  • Links to Very Useful Websites
title: Kindle Formatting -  Kindle Publishing and CreateSpace
